za.ac.salt.pipt.common
Interface SpectrumOperator

All Known Implementing Classes:
Atmosphere, Filter, JohnsonFilter, Mirrors, SpectrumPropagationFilter
public interface SpectrumOperator

This interface applies to any class that modifies a spectrum. Examples include mirrors, filters, atmospheres, galaxies.

Method Summary
 void apply(GenericSpectrum spectrum)
          Applies some kind of modification to the given spectrum.
 

Method Detail

apply

void apply(GenericSpectrum spectrum)
Applies some kind of modification to the given spectrum.

Parameters:
spectrum - the spectrum to be modified
